snippet: Tehran denied a report in The New York Times that it had offered a “nine-step plan” aimed at resolving its nuclear standoff with the West.
abstract: Iran denies reports that it has a step-by-step plan for resolving nuclear standoff with the United States and its allies.
lead_paragraph: Tehran denied a report in The New York Times that it had offered a “nine-step plan” aimed at resolving its nuclear standoff with the West.

headline.main: Iran Denies Plan to End Nuclear Standoff
headline.print_headline: Iran Denies Plan to End Nuclear Standoff
